prompt: Create a modern dashboard interface with clean white background and vibrant accent colors. Include top app bar with hamburger menu, search, and notification bell icons. Display welcoming 'Good Morning, John!' greeting followed by four colorful metric cards in 2x2 grid with distinct background colors (blue, green, orange, purple), numerical values, labels, and trend icons. Add 'Recent Activity' section header with list of three activity items containing icons, titles, subtitles, and timestamps. Use proper spacing, shadows, and rounded corners for polished appearance.
